divs: Sighting DetailsTwo Witnesses to a bright UFO in East Taunton Massachusetts. South western Sky. Object was brightly lit in the night sky. White was primary light and intense. Changed to a red to blue light intermittently. Object was swaying slightly like a pendulum. Distance from object could not be determined due to location in sky. Airplane's passed at same time and there was no similarity between the object and the aircraft. Neither witness could identify what they observed.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Taunton
There were no other sightings in Taunton on or around March 26th 2010
